headline: Cache API for Cloudflare Workers is now in Beta!
keywords: Cloudflare Workers, Serverless, Beta, Cache, API, JavaScript
description: In October of last year we announced the launch of Cloudflare Workers. Workers allow you to run JavaScript from 150+ of Cloudflareâ€™s data centers. This means that from the moment a request hits the Cloudflare network, you have full control over its destiny.
